definition: France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])

sentences.english: Be strictly compliance with laws and regulations, and to ensure food safety from product design.
sentences.chinese: 嚴格遵守法律法規，食品安全從產品設計抓起。

sentences.english: F. Other the promotion behavior of all lawbreaking code.
sentences.chinese: 其他一切違反法律法規的推廣行爲。

sentences.english: I. Love sums up the whole Law.
sentences.chinese: 愛人如己是一切律法的總綱。

sentences.english: But Israel, which followed after the law of righteousness, hath not attained to the law of righteousness.
sentences.chinese: 但以色列人追求律法的義，反得不着律法的義。

sentences.english: But Israel, which followed after the law of righteousness, hath not attained to the law of righteousness.
sentences.chinese: 但以色列人追求律法的義，反得不着律法的義。

sentences.english: This database presents and links to English-language information about HIV/AIDS-related statutes from countries in Asia.
sentences.chinese: 本數據庫主要提供亞洲各國與艾滋病有關的法律法規。

sentences.english: Have the hearers been convicted of their sin by the Law?
sentences.chinese: 信衆因着律法已經被定罪了嗎？

sentences.english: A. One form in which God revealed His moral Law to people is the Ten Commandments.
sentences.chinese: 神顯明給他百姓的道德律法的一個形式就是十條誡。

sentences.english: Antinomianism is derived from two Greek words ("anti" and "nomos") that literally mean "against the law.
sentences.chinese: 反律法主義來源於兩個希臘詞語，義爲“反對律法”。

sentences.english: Antinomianism is derived from two Greek words ("anti" and "nomos") that literally mean "against the law.
sentences.chinese: 反律法主義來源於兩個希臘詞語，義爲“反對律法”。

sentences.english: I will always obey your law, for ever and ever.
sentences.chinese: 我要常守你的律法，直到永永遠遠。

sentences.english: If anyone turns a deaf ear to the law, even his prayers are detestable.
sentences.chinese: 轉耳不聽律法的，他的祈禱也爲可憎。

sentences.english: For all the law is fulfilled in one word, [even] in this; Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself.
sentences.chinese: 因爲全律法都包在愛人如己這一句話之內了。
反律法主義有兩個主要的形式。

sentences.english: Rivers of waters run down mine eyes, because they keep not thy law.
sentences.chinese: 我的眼淚下流成河，因爲他們不守你的律法。

sentences.english: In the area of family history, different orders and laws are being applied.
sentences.chinese: 在家史領域，不同的序位和律法在運行着。
